title: Facebook Messenger Comes To Watch With Audio Messaging And Location Sharing
text: Facebook is finally coming to the Apple Watch in the form of a Messenger app that allows users to send text messages, audio messages, and share their location. The ability to simply talk to Messenger, and have friends be able to listen to that message, will allow for unprescedented hands-free chat over Facebook.
